name: Seek A Way Out (PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé)
name_original: Seek A Way Out (PRINCESS INTERNET CAFé)
description:
The year is 2052. The Earth is a hellscape. The ultrarich have privatised all access to basic resources such as water, food and oxygen. Millions have died and things are looking more dire each day. Pandora finds themselves waking up in a strange facility.

Will Pandora (or any of their alter-egos) make it out alive?

Controls
  • Scroll down as you would any web page.
  • Click/tap to navigate through the Main Menu.
  • At some points in the story the game will make you choose an option from a list, click/tap to select your choice.
  • The game should run on mobile phones, but depending on the size of the screen experiences may vary.
Acknowledgements
  • The script was written in Ink. Cheers, Inkle! ;-)
  • I used Calico (by Elliot Herriman) for the game engine. Go check it out! Thanks, Elliot! :-D
  • Special thanks to Luke, for proofreading and helping me out with the UI <3
  • SFX:
    • 90's PC Startup.wav by Masman8675.
    • Alarm-01-Long.wav by Lalks.
